oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Photograph of Quintard, Maria Batterham, and John William Batterham Lindsey
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The photograph shows two brothers standing with their mother in an outdoor setting. Both of the men are U.S. Army officers with the one on the proper left, probably John William Batterham Lindsey, having three overseas chevrons on his left sleeve. The family was from Chattanooga, Tennessee. Quintard suffered from lung issues due to the war and was hospitalized at Johnson City where he met his wife. John William Batterham Lindsey served in the 81st Division.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Batterham, Quintard; Batterham, Maria; Lindsey, John William Batterham
